sourcesContent:
import * as React from "react"; import {Formik,Form,Field} from "formik"; import * as Yup from "yup"; const initialValues ={ firstName:"", secondName:"", email:"", contact:"", buildingCode:"", password:"" } const onSubmit =values=>{ console.log('formik values',values) } const validationSchema = Yup.object({ firstName:Yup.string().required("First Name Required"), secondName:Yup.string().required("Second Name Required"), email:Yup.string().email("Invalid Email").required("Email ID Required"), contact:Yup.number().typeError("Invalid Contact Number ").required("Contact Number Required"), buildingCode:Yup.string().required("Required Building Code"), password:Yup.string().required("Required Password"), }) function UserSignup(){ return(
{formik.touched.firstName && formik.errors.firstName ?
{formik.errors.firstName}
:null} {formik.touched.secondName && formik.errors.secondName ?
{formik.errors.secondName}
:null}
{formik.touched.email && formik.errors.email ?
{formik.errors.email}
:null}
{formik.touched.contact && formik.errors.contact ?
{formik.errors.contact}
:null}
{formik.touched.buildingCode && formik.errors.buildingCode ?
{formik.errors.buildingCode}
:null}
{formik.touched.password && formik.errors.password ?
{formik.errors.password}
:null}
) } export default UserSignup;
